name: Doughnut Delight
description:
We all love consuming the small, fried, rings of dough we know as doughnuts. So what better way to show our love than to make as many as we can in a small amount of time! Doughnut Delight can help you show that love by doing exactly that.

Originally created in December 2014 for Ludum Dare 31. Developed in 48 hours by Justin Nauta, based on the Theme "Entire Game on One Screen". Re-Uploaded to this website, but left unchanged for posterity purposes.
